prompt: Je ne reçois pas de notifications.
expected_answer: Assurez-vous que les notifications sont activées. Vous pouvez les activer en définissant la propriété `notifications.enabled` dans `xwiki.properties` sur `true`. De plus, assurez-vous que vous suivez les pages ou les utilisateurs dont vous souhaitez recevoir des notifications. Vous pouvez suivre une page, une page et ses enfants, ou un wiki entier. Pour suivre un emplacement, il vous suffit d'y aller, puis de cliquer sur le menu "alerte" (représenté par une cloche) et d'activer les notifications souhaitées. Pour suivre un utilisateur, si vous allez sur le profil d'un utilisateur, en utilisant l'index utilisateur par exemple, vous pouvez décider de suivre l'utilisateur. Cela signifie que vous recevrez toutes les notifications concernant les événements déclenchés par cet utilisateur. Dans votre profil utilisateur, si vous allez dans l'onglet "réseau", vous pouvez voir la liste des utilisateurs que vous suivez et les événements qui ont été effectués par eux.
ai_answer:
Sources: https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Notifications%20Application/ 
https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/XWikiSyntax/ 


Based on the provided search results, here are some steps you can take to ensure you receive notifications:

1. **Enable Notifications for All Users by Default (Administrators)**: If you have administrator privileges, you can enable notifications for all users by default. This is done by setting the `xwiki.notification.default.enabled` property to `true`. You can find more information about this in document index 2.

2. **Select Notification Types**: By default, users only get notifications when they are mentioned or when actions are performed on pages they created or updated. To receive other notifications, you need to select which "types" of notifications you want to receive. This can be done through the "settings" link on the notifications menu (document index 3).

3. **Check Notification Applications Preferences**: Ensure that the notification applications preferences are set correctly for you. You can check and modify these preferences using the `notificationsApplicationsPreferences` macro (document index 4).

4. **Enable Auto Watch**: Make sure auto watch is enabled for pages you're interested in. This can be done through the "settings" link on the notifications menu or by using the `notificationsAutoWatchPreferences` macro (document index 4).

5. **Check Custom Notification Filters**: Ensure that your custom notification filters are set up correctly. You can view and modify these preferences using the `notificationsCustomFiltersPreferences` macro (document index 4).

## Get a notification RSS feed

You can get a RSS feed of the notifications occurring in your wiki. This feed can be accessed either through a link in your notification tray (or at the bottom of the notifications macro).

![NotificationTrayRSSLink.png](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/Notifications%20Application/WebHome/NotificationTrayRSSLink.png?rev=1.3)  
![NotificationsWithRSS.png](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/Notifications%20Application/WebHome/NotificationsWithRSS.png?rev=1.3)

## Notifications Macro

The [Notifications Macro is provided by its own application](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Notifications%20Macro/).

# Settings

On the notifications menu, you also have a link to go to the "settings" of the notifications.

![notif4.png](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/Notifications%20Application/WebHome/notif4.png?rev=1.8)

By default, users only get notifications when they are mentioned or when actions are performed on pages they created or updated. For receiving other notifications, you need to select which "types" of notifications you want to receive. When a page is created? When a blog post is published?

You can enable or disable all notification types that belong to a particular application by clicking on the bells associated to this application. If some types are enabled and other are disabled inside an application, the switch looks like the next screenshot, meaning that the application's notifications are partially enabled:

![NotifUndeterminate.png](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/Notifications%20Application/WebHome/NotifUndeterminate.png?rev=1.3)

Note that you only receive notifications that occur after you turn on the notifications types.

| [notifications](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/Notifications/Code/Macro/NotificationsMacro) | Notifications | Notifications | Display notifications about events happened on the wiki. | Current Wiki |
| [notificationsApplicationsPreferences](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/Notifications/Code/NotificationsApplicationsPreferencesMacro) | Notifications Applications Preferences | Notifications | Display the preferences of the current user about notification applications. | Current Wiki |
| [notificationsAutoWatchPreferences](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/Notifications/Code/NotificationsAutoWatchPreferencesMacro) | Notifications Auto Watch Preferences | Notifications | Display the preferences of the current user about auto watched pages. | Current Wiki |
| [notificationsCustomFiltersPreferences](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/Notifications/Code/NotificationsCustomFiltersPreferencesMacro) | Notifications Custom Filters Preferences | Notifications | Display the preferences of the given user about custom notification filters. | Current Wiki |
| [notificationsEmailPreferences](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/Notifications/Code/NotificationsEmailPreferencesMacro) | Notifications Email Preferences | Notifications | Display the preferences of the current user about notification emails. | Current Wiki |
| [notificationsFiltersPreferences](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/Notifications/Code/NotificationsFiltersPreferencesMacro) | Notifications Filters Preferences (deprecated) | Notifications | Display the preferences of the current user about notification filters.This macro is now deprecated in favor of Custom Notifications Filters Preferences or System Notifications Filters Preferences. | Current Wiki |
